skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. 

Also has a 30% chance of placing a [Fear] debuff for 1 turn on enemies with 20% or less Turn Meter.
skills.name: Nightmare Sludge
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has an 80% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. 

After attacking, has an 80% chance of decreasing the Turn Meter by 30% of each enemy without a [Stun] debuff.
skills.name: Stagnation Sickness
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Removes all debuffs from all allies, then fills the Turn Meter of each ally by 15%. 

Fills the Turn Meter of each ally by a further 10% for every [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], [Provoke], [Sleep], [Stun], or [Petrification] debuff removed. 

Fills the Turn Meter of each ally by a further 5% for any other debuff removed.
skills.name: Beyond Emotions

skills.desc:
Immune to [Sleep] debuffs. 

Fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 20% whenever an enemy tries to place a [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], [Provoke], [Sleep], [Stun], or [Petrification] debuff on this Champion.
skills.name: Uncanny [P]
